author: Staff Reporter
text: Mahila Court Judge V.V. Thaniarassu awarded life sentence to a person in a murder case here on Tuesday. The accused, Loganathan (47), was from Rayakottai village on Varushanadu hill. Police had arrested Loganathan in connection with the murder of his wife Kumutha in 2004. After the judge sentenced Loganathan, he was taken to Madurai Central Prison.
title: Life sentence for murder
